label: SpecifiedChemicalTreatment
comment: Any substance such as dyestuffs, chrome oxide, acids, sulphate, surfactant or other chemicals applied to an agricultural field, substrate, plant, animal product, material or product.

objectProperties.comment: A sustainability characteristic applicable to this specified chemical treatment.
A textual description of this specified chemical treatment.
An identifier of this specified chemical treatment.
A process certificate for this specified chemical treatment.
The code specifying the type of chemical treatment.
A distinct chemical used for this specified chemical treatment.
